Transformative:

The architecture of work culture

01

ASB

In conversation

Changes in the workplace

A workplace that also transforms a city’s waterfront is a rarity. The ASB North Wharf on Auckland’s harbor front is such a workplace and even rarer is its antecedence….

There is no paradigm for a legal workplace, smart lawyers are agile and responsive to client’s demands and as the Curmudgeon’s Guide to Practicing Law* notes “we make...
